name: atbl
description: Another library to use the official bot api of Telegram.

scripts.npm:publish:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run prepare && npm publish
scripts.npm:publish:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run prepare && npm publish
scripts.npm:publish:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run prepare && npm publish
